results.title: Childhood idiopathic steroid resistant nephrotic syndrome in Southwestern Nigeria.
results.text_hl: The outcome with @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroid@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cyclophosphamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003520 @@@cyclophosphamide@@@-based treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Nephrotic_syndrome_idiopathic_steroid_resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536404 @@@iSRNS@@@ was further enhanced with addition of either @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Spironolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013148 @@@spironolactone@@@.

citations.NLM: Olowu WA, Adelusola KA, Adefehinti O. Childhood idiopathic steroid resistant nephrotic syndrome in Southwestern Nigeria. Saudi J Kidney Dis Transpl. 2010 Sep;21(5):979-90. PMID: 20814150
